item.title: Friends Reunion Special on HBO Max Has Been Postponed
item.description: The Friends reunion has been called off as the project will be postponed to help prevent the spread of COVID-19.

item.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Still Has a Lot Left to Shoot Following Production Delay
item.description: Netflix made the decision late last week to shut down production on all of their scripted projects, which includes Stranger Things.

item.title: Robert Englund Wants You to Watch His New Show True Terror Tonight
item.description: The Travel Channel is all set to debut their brand-new horror series True Terror with Robert Englund this evening.

item.title: Bruce Campbell Agrees: Now Is a Great Time to Binge Ash Vs. Evil Dead
item.description: Since we're all stuck at home, now would be a fantastic time to binge-watch Ash vs. Evil Dead on Netflix.

item.title: Ahsoka Tano Returns in New Star Wars: The Clone Wars Trailer on Disney+
item.description: Disney has released a new trailer for Star Wars: The Clone Wars previewing the return of Ahsoka Tano.

item.title: Game of Thrones Star Kristofer Hivju Tests Positive for Coronavirus in Norway
item.description: Tormund Giantsbane actor Kristofer Hivju has revealed from his home in Norway he's tested positive for coronavirus.

item.title: Modern Family Dog Stella Dies Shortly After Final Episode Wraps
item.description: Beatrice, the French Bulldog who plays Ed O'Neill's dog Stella on Modern Family, has passed away.

item.title: Game of Thrones Ending Annoyed Emilia Clarke
item.description: Game of Thrones star Emilia Clarke is suggesting she wasn't too thrilled with the way her character's story arc ended.

item.title: Marvel's Disney+ Shows Halt Production: Loki, WandaVision and The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
item.description: Disney first announced they were halting production on their movies, then they closed their theme parks, and now they've halted all Disney+ shows.

item.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Stops Shooting as Netflix Suspends All Production
item.description: Netflix is up next to halt all production as the coronavirus is deemed a national emergency by the Trump administration.

item.title: NBA Season Suspended, Players Quarantined, After Positive Coronavirus Test Comes Back
item.description: The Utah Jazz and Oklahoma Thunder players are currently quarantined in the OKC arena following Rudy Gobert testing positive for the coronavirus.

item.title: The Boys Season 2 First Look at Gender-Swapped Stormfront in Amazon Prime Series
item.description: Our first look at one of the new superheroes to join The Boys, Stormfront, has officially been released.

item.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier Star Sebastian Stan Celebrates Bucky's 107th Birthday
item.description: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier star posted a behind-the-scenes video in honor of his Marvel Cinematic Universe birthday.

item.title: Altered Carbon: Resleeved Trailer: Netflix Series Gets an Anime Spinoff Movie
item.description: Netflix has released a new trailer for Altered Carbon: Resleeved, a brand new anime movie based on the works of Richard K. Morgan.

item.title: Tron TV Show Was Happening at Disney+ But Has Been Scrapped
item.description: Oscar-winner John Ridley was developing a Tron series for the Disney+ streaming service that will never see the light of day.

item.title: The Real Ghostbusters Writer Campaigns for a Revival Series
item.description: The Real Ghostbusters writer J. Michael Straczynski is pleading with Jason and Ivan Reitman to revive the animated series.

item.title: Zack Morris Is Still Trash in Saved by the Bell Reboot Promises Mark-Paul Gosselaar
item.description: Mark-Paul Gosselaar says the older Zack Morris is 'a little offensive and sort of not being on the right side of things.'

item.title: She-Hulk Rumored Plot and Character Details Leak for Disney+ Series
item.description: A new report suggests She-Hulk will focus on legal drama over action and unveils new details about its characters.

item.title: Beauty and the Beast Prequel Series with Gaston and LeFou Is Coming to Disney+
item.description: Disney is developing a Beauty and the Beast prequel series that will star Josh Gad and Luke Evans.

item.title: Hawkeye Disney+ Series Prep Teased by Jeremy Renner
item.description: Avengers: Endgame star Jeremy Renner is seemingly getting ready for Hawkeye, which is expected to begin filming this year.

item.title: Bill Clinton Explains Reason Behind Monica Lewinsky Affair in Hulu's Hillary Docuseries
item.description: Hulu's Hillary documentary is reportedly full of explosive details about the former U.S. secretary of state's life.

item.title: Daniel Craig Won't Quit Being James Bond in Bone-Breaking SNL Promo
item.description: No Time to Die star Daniel Craig just cannot keep Bond at bay in this hilarious promo for the upcoming Saturday Night Live.

item.title: The Last of Us Video Game Is Becoming an HBO TV Show Instead of a Movie
item.description: HBO is making a TV series based on Sony's hit game The Last of Us, with Craig Mazin and Neil Druckmann on board.

item.title: Loki First Look Shows Tom Hiddleston On Set, Are We Also Getting Lady Loki?
item.description: Disney+'s Loki series is now shooting and we have our first unofficial look at the series after seeing a quick official snippet during the Super Bowl.

item.title: The Mandalorian Season 2 Leak Hints at the Surprise Return of a Star Wars Favorite?
item.description: It looks a surprise presence may be returning for The Mandalorian season 2, alongside director Peyton Reed.

item.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Table Read Video Reunites the Cast for New Netflix Episodes
item.description: Netflix has shared a new teaser for Stranger Things season 4 which will bring back another key character.

item.title: The Boys Season 2 Is Bringing Butcher's Dog Terror to Amazon Prime
item.description: Karl Urban has confirmed that Butcher's dog Terror will be making a big impact on all-new episodes of Amazon Prime's The Boys.

item.title: WandaVison Disney+ Series Wraps First Season with a Huge Party
item.description: WandaVision will hit Disney+ later this year and centers on Elizabeth Olsen's Wanda Maximoff and Paul Bettany's Vision.

item.title: Alison Brie Is She-Hulk in BossLogic's Disney+ Series Fan Art
item.description: Alison Brie looks rather convincing as Jennifer Walters in BossLogic's latest fan art for Marvel's upcoming She-Hulk series.

item.title: Mark Ruffalo in Preliminary Talks to Return as Hulk in She-Hulk Disney+ Series
item.description: After initially stating he was unsure about the future of the Hulk, Mark Ruffalo admits that he could show up in the She-Hulk series.

item.title: The Mandalorian Season 2 Director Rumors Debunked by James Mangold
item.description: The Mandalorian season 2 will not feature an episode directed by James Mangold as he claims talks never even happened.

item.title: Day of the Dead TV Show Is Not Sanctioned or Endorsed by the George A. Romero Estate
item.description: SyFy's upcoming Day of the Dead series does not have any connections to horror legend George A. Romero.

item.title: Kim Bodnia Is Vesemir in The Witcher Season 2 for Netflix
item.description: Kim Bodnia has been cast as Vesemir in The Witcher season 2 on Netflix alongside Henry Cavill.

item.title: Day of the Dead TV Show Is Coming to Syfy Based on George A. Romero's Classic
item.description: SyFy has handed out a straight-to-series order for Day of the Dead which will reimagine the zombie flick for the small screen.

item.title: The Simpsons Turns Marvel's Kevin Feige Into the New Thanos
item.description: A preview for an upcoming episode of The Simpsons brings in Kevin Feige as a Thanos-like villain.

item.title: Revamped The Lost Boys TV Show Finds Its New Michael and Head Vampire on The CW
item.description: The upcoming reboot of vampire-classic The Lost Boys has now found its lead vampires and new Michael.

item.title: Shudder's Cursed Films Trailer Explores Legendary Ill-Fated Horror Movie Productions
item.description: Shudder's documentary series Cursed Films will explore the real-life horror stories behind the productions of many horror movies.

item.title: Is The Mandalorian Season 2 Getting Robert Rodriguez and James Mangold to Direct Episodes?
item.description: Robert Rodriguez and James Mangold reportedly stepped up to direct their own episodes of The Mandalorian season 2.

item.title: Silence of the Lambs TV Show Gets Rebecca Breeds as FBI Agent Clarice Starling
item.description: CBS has found its small screen version of Clarice Starling in Pretty Little Liars and The Originals actress Rebecca Breeds.

item.title: New The Simpsons Poster Takes on Avengers: Endgame
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe is about to get The Simpsons treatment in an upcoming episode.

item.title: The Movies That Made Us Season 2 Teaser Announces New Episodes Are Coming to Netflix
item.description: The Movies That Made Us is coming back for season 2, which movies are they going to tackle this time around?

item.title: Macaulay Culkin Joins American Horror Story Season 10
item.description: Ryan Murphy has revealed the cast for American Horror Story season 10, with many familiar faces and one rather big surprise.

item.title: Love, Simon TV Show Gets a New Title as It Moves from Disney+ to Hulu
item.description: Disney's Love, Simon TV show is officially titled Love, Victor and will debut on Hulu this summer.

item.title: Friends Cast Reunion Special Arrives with HBO Max Streaming Launch in May
item.description: The Friends cast are finally able to open up about their upcoming HBO Max reunion special after months of speculation.

item.title: Amazon Prime's A League of Their Own TV Show Announces Full Cast and Story Details
item.description: 1992's A League of Their Own is getting its own series at Amazon Prime and we now have some new details about it.

item.title: The Witcher Season 2: Michael Keaton and Mads Mikkelsen Rejected Netflix's Vesemir Offer?
item.description: Both Michael Keaton and Mads Mikkelsen were reportedly offered the role of Vesemir for Netflix's second season of The WItcher.

item.title: Stranger Things Season 4 Wraps on 'The American' in Vilnius, New Set Images Released
item.description: Director Shawn Levy is finished shooting on location in Vilnius, Lithuania with David Harbour as The American.

item.title: Amazing Stories Trailer: Steven Spielberg Revives the Classic Anthology for Apple TV+
item.description: Apple has released the first trailer for Amazing Stories, which is set to make its debut next month.

item.title: Snow Globe: A Breaking Bad Short Gives Us More of Todd from El Camino
item.description: Todd Alquist is clearly smitten with Lydia Rodarte-Quayle in a new Breaking Bad short film released by AMC.

item.title: Mark Hamill Is Skeletor in Kevin Smith and Netflix's Masters of the Universe Anime Series
item.description: Netflix has revealed the full cast for Kevin Smith's new Masters of the Universe series, led by Mark Hamill as the evil Skeletor.
